15531341112.content:
As you have never consumed alcohol before you didn’t want to risk anything bad so you decided to talk to the Blaziken. “So what exactly is this place?” You asked the tall female. “This brothel provides food, drinks and special services. Patrons can stay as long as they want but once they decide to leave they have to pay up. Adults who bring children don’t have to worry about paying for their children. Unaccompanied children, well, we provide very special treatment just for them. You don’t have to worry about your little secret.” The Blaziken winked, you blushed, but you guessed that retorted against her it sounded a bit sketchy. “Actually, if you do me a favor I won’t have to tell my boss you’re here.” The Blaziken said with smile.

What does the Blaziken want?

1. Her break is in a minute and she’s feeling peckish and she wants you stuff her with food till her belly bloats. And afterward she wants you to rub her belly.

A few shot curious glances at you, while others, namely the mienshao workers, looked at you with a more... hungry look. Eventually, though, the Blaziken put down her rag and the mug she was just cleaning. She then stepped out from behind the counter, and approached you.

"Alright, ready to make yourself useful?" she asked. You understood that you had to do as she said now, so you simply nodded. "It's break time. Come, follow me." She then began to walk away, forcing you to jump down and follow after her. You two soon enterred a hallway leading deeper into the building. Down the hallways, you saw more purple. There were more mienshao, dressed up in just aprons, and nothing else. They gazed at you funnily, and you felt the urge to stick closer to the Blaziken's leg.

Soon, the two of you got to a set of doors marked "employees only".

"You're with me, you'll be fine," the Blaziken said. She then spread the doors open, and you were able to enter with her. Within, you saw a room about as big as the bar, though it didn't seem to have the similar atmosphere. Rather than being built for people that'll drink themselves into a stupor, this seems more aesthetically geared towards professionals. You could see a few Pokemon in here a little older than you, yet fairly young to the workers. You could also see some other Pokemon that seemed more Blaziken's age.

"I'm feelin' peckish, bud," the Blaziken said. "And I have a particular meal in mind..."

15531341112111.content:
"...Working here," she finished. At that, your eyes widened and you stumbled back.

"What?!" you yelped out.

"Rub," she commanded. You then leaned in and rubbed, still nervous.

"I-I'm sorry, working with you?" you ask. "It's just, am I allowed to?"

"We don't have terribly strict rules here," she said. "You'd make for a great masseuse with proper training."

"B-but my family..." you said, still rubbing. "Won't they wonder where I am whenever I go here?"

"Don't worry, you're gonna -urp- you're gonna fit right in," she said. "We'll send someone to talk to your parents, and reward you handsomely. In the meantime, you're gonna -urp- tend to a few stressed people."

"Rewarded... handsomely?"

"Yep, you'll get some nice trinkets."

"Uh... I guess it wouldn't hurt..."

"Great! Now-" Before she could finish her sentence, she released a powerful belch, strong enough to nail you like a punch, thrusting you off of her stomach and sprawling onto the floor. You groaned, both from the pain and the smell. "Sorry 'bout that." She chuckled a bit as she sat down on the floor, next to you. "So, what times do you feel free to work? Day? Noon? Night?" Mulling over the words she offered up, you chose to work...

We run a special program where children like your son can enroll in special classes and if your child does well, your family will be rewarded handsomely.” The Blaziken said, your mother was a sucker for extra schooling so she beamed. “That sounds wonderful, when will he begin?” Your mother asked, tilting her head. “Today, and before you ask these classes are everyday from twelve to four.” The Blaziken said, your mother turned to you and gave you a hug “This is going to be so wonderful, have fun.” Your mother said releasing you and the you left with the Blaziken.

You decided your dear toy needed some time to recover. After all, you didn't want your other guests to think you're neglecting them. You stood up and picked up the Pancham, whose vision was rendered fuzzy by your time on top of him, and draped him over your shoulder. You marched to a side room, which led to a wall covered side to side in doors. You opened one with a Pancham drawing on it, gently placed the Pancham within it, and closed the door behind him.

Now, who're you in the mood for?
15532322.title: Call upon another "toy"

1553233.content:
Just an idea.
How about a legendary Pokemon?
1553233.title: Something else

15532331.content: Of the legendaries, how are you?
15532331.title: Legendary  Pokemon

155323313.content: If not them, maybe one of these?
155323313.title: Someone else

15533.content: You're still gonna look for your parents. Though, first, we need to discuss what kind of Pokémon you are.
15533.title: Keep searching for parents

155332.content:
You're a short, blue-furred creature with a set of black fur below your waist almost resembling pants. You got big ears, big eyes, and a winning smile. You think you remember your parents mentioning that you might be too cute to harm, but your parents would also say that looking cute alone won't save you in the outside world. Well, maybe you'll learn what it takes to survive. Your parents were missing, and you weren't sure they'll be back anytime soon. So, you leapt out of the tree, and looked around for signs.

Unfortunately, you weren't good at finding tracks. So, right now, you had to make a wild guess. The closest things you see are a cave, a forest, a land with a strong psychic presence to it, and a dilapidated house that looked like it'd be haunted.

You decided to go to...
155332.title: A Shinx

choices: Go to the one with the witch hat
1553324.content:
You decided the next spot of interest was this house here. You hated the idea of going in that spooky-looking house, but that was the most interesting looking spot now. You approached it, and the closer you got, the more freaky it felt. You began to feel your hands stand on their ends, the chill of fear running down your spine. You reached for the doorknob, but it opened up in front of you. Surely a trick with the wind, right? At least you thought until you heard a faint chuckle. Still, you had to do this for your parents.

You entered, scanning around fearful. As you scan around, you notice a couple of rooms. One room seemed to have a bird-shaped creature boasting fan-like appendages. One room held a doll with a zipper-like mouth. One room held a Magical Pokémon with a witch-like hat. And one room had a... Pikachu-shaped figure? Which room do you think would help you out?
1553324.title: ...the haunted house

info.brief_description: When you're separated from your family, you have to brave the scary world around you.
info.description:
Ever since you were born, your parents have been teaching you how dangerous the world is. Due to how small you are, many Pokémon could easily eat you up, or do something worse. However, when your parents go missing from your home, you have to brave the world, avoid terrifying predators, and hopefully find your family. Can you succeed? Or will you be eaten, or worse, by bigger Pokémon?

You play the role of a small Pokémon. Something like a Riolu, or a Teddiursa. When your parents go missing, you can only go out and try to find them. But you have to worry about the other Pokémon. Lopunnies might kidnap you, Arcanines might eat you, and so on and so forth. You, being so small, can't defend yourself too well, so you have to run and hide. Be careful of the tall grass, watch for hungry birds, and try not to attract too much attention.

Recommended practices:
*Vore
*Flatulence
*Squashing
*Domination
*Stench

Rules
1: Don't be too gory
2: Player characters are small and susceptible to predators
3: Don't make chapter too short
4: Please keep good grammar
5: The player is male
6: The player is never willing in voracious, gaseous, or sexual acts
7: Please no humans

Recently, new scenarios are being added, so the following rules are disabled/amended.
2. No longer necessary if you're playing pred
5. Player doesn't have to be male if they're pred
6. Willingness is allowed now under the "Brothel" scenario
